resources.string: Overweight. Do seek doctor advice on the best way to reduce weight and possibility of health risk based on your health assessment.
Obese. Do seek doctor advice on the best way to reduce weight and possibility of health risk based on your health assessment.
Extremely Obese. Do seek doctor advice on the best way to reduce weight and possibility of health risk based on your health assessment.
At Risk. Do seek doctor advice on the best way to reduce any health risk based on your health assessment.
High Risk. Do seek doctor advice on the best way to reduce any health risk based on your health assessment.
Pre-diabetes. Do seek doctor advice on the proper treatment to reduce glucose level in blood.
Diabetes. Do seek doctor advice on the proper treatment to reduce glucose level in blood.
Poor. Look out for other symptoms such as being short of breath, feeling dizzy, having discomfort in your chest. You should visit your doctor immediately for health assessment and treatment.
